channel.title: etcutils on Julio Merino (jmmv.dev)
channel.description: Recent content in etcutils on Julio Merino (jmmv.dev)

item.title: Announcing etcutils 0.1
item.description: During past week, I worked on a new package called etcutils. It provides a (reduced) tool-set to programmatically manage files in /etc and is specially designed to allow pkgsrc to update /etc/shells and /etc/services in a more consistent way. I'm happy to say that the 0.1 release is now ready! Go to the etcutils web page for details. (I know that if you are a Linux user, you probably don't care about this because your distribution most likely already provides something similar.
